definition[0]: the complete destruction of a building
example[0]: Consent is required for the demolition of any building.
example[1]: Demolition work has already begun at the site.
example[2]: 50,000 fans watched the 7-0 demolition of Dynamo Kiev.
definition[2]: a process in which something is ended or ruined completely
example[3]: The policies are intended to halt the demolition of the rural economy.
definition[3]: the act of proving that an idea, opinion etc is wrong
example[4]: This is a legend that deserves demolition.
